title: SKCanvas may be native memory leak in Xamarin.Forms
body:
### Description

SKCanvas looks like not release SKRegion SKShader in next frame. More and more memory is occupied.

### Code

I upload a simple code in [https://github.com/j4587698/SkiaSharpTest.git](https://github.com/j4587698/SkiaSharpTest.git)
If you drag the screen. The memory will increase and not release in GC.

### Expected Behavior

All memory will released in next frame.

### Actual Behavior

More and more memory is occupied.

### Basic Information

- Version with issue:  1.60.2
- Last known good version:  
- IDE:  Visual Studio 
- Platform Target Frameworks: 
  - Android: Android 8.1
  - UWP:  16299
- Target Devices:
  -   android: simulator 6.0
  -   UWP: local
